channel.title: Pk-Legacy V3 Revamped | Very Unique Server | New Content You Will Never Find!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/74892aa30b2c7df35fd2176728e285d9.png[/img][/center]
[center]Welcome to Pk-Legacy, Pk-Legacy is a eco/pking based server. Loads of unique content and features. Fairly easy to level up, and to obtain nice gear. Hope to see you guys in game. Begin your legacy by clicking play now!! You wont regret it.[/center]
[center]Website: [url=http://pklegacy.com/]http://pklegacy.com/[/url] Play Now!! (Updated Jar) [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/1xju9hkg8sm80cv/Pk-LegacyV2.jar?dl=1]https://www.dropbox.com/s/1xju9hkg8sm80cv/Pk-LegacyV2.jar?dl=1[/url][/center]
[center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/c292d6c2531e01dfa956a7be9f289190.png[/img][/center]
[center]FULL SCREEN CLIENT A Agility Shop with interfaces for tickets. All Skills Level To 125 Working Auras in-game Fixed Minigames Better Combat Working MoneyPouch! Summoning Orb With Draining Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe! custom items with 711 model header [Server] Announcement when you get 99 [Server] Announcement when you receive a rage drop Custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands Lottery, [Lottie] Added 2 Starters Per Ip Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in 120 Dungeoneering Server AutoSave No Bank Lag Player Titles Auto-Server Save Re-Wrote Mage Added in dice command for Donator+ New Interfaces Comp Cape requireing all 99s. New Superdonator Extreme Donator Rank Better Duel Arena New ::Help method Better Prayer Better Eco 2b Ticket Exchange Nice Player Titles With a good Interface Player Titles for most ranks Player Cliping Summoning Working Fixed Charms Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regualr ones) Staff Tab saying if staff is online or not. Most Sinlge and Double doors working the way they need to Awesome Donator Benifits Fixed Freezing in Wise old man And LOADS OF MORE THINGS![/center]
[center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/295378c480e01f1caded7ceb3092775c.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/b73baf083493278ede6f3605aaa7787a.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/d5e744d8fa425c27f2b9169ca77d41d0.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e29a2b8f8ddd966327c6ef534cee6ebd.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e9d23d524572d7051235b329463cf151.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/338ffd32be6576c0f9e59528527a6cdf.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/3242f2f70ddba1c06ff232ca56b1d318.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f4d11c1d14fc1de5763c13a10f420907.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/da61b3604b9deb6fd6d5a869b5b2ec2c.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/d571d820e7dd2a6bd6460d31bf96ccef.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/186cf250f30936021b5936a6cbadf03a.png[/img][/center]e.png[/img][img]http://i.gyazo.com/b59b0b19ad9391824b9ac97794847ac0.png[/img][/center]

@gnarlnuts wrote:

item.title: Pk-Legacy V3 Revamped | Very Unique Server | New Content You Will Never Find!
item.dc:creator: @stingray2121 stingray2121
item.description:
@stingray2121 wrote:

ayeitswill:

looks like a good server. Don’t worry about staff, anyone can be staff and if you get a bad egg you will learn from that mistake. Never trust the ones who you don’t know because in the end they will ruin your server. I mean… when a server first starts they need staff badly because they moderate the server for the owner. This project looks awesome and keep it up, if you need any models or any help I can make some for your server. Just send me a pm.

Thanks Man, i love the positive feed back. This project has tooken my lif, im very dedicated and me and my devs will get this server big agian

Read full topic

looks like a good server. Don’t worry about staff, anyone can be staff and if you get a bad egg you will learn from that mistake. Never trust the ones who you don’t know because in the end they will ruin your server. I mean… when a server first starts they need staff badly because they moderate the server for the owner. This project looks awesome and keep it up, if you need any models or any help I can make some for your server. Just send me a pm.

item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“stingray2121, post:24, topic:551052”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=669966.msg4480910#msg4480910 date=1429667726]

I played for 5 hours and i got promoted to moderator brandon played 3 hours got promoted to moderator[/quote]
This is really not a good way to choose staff, so abruptly.

Its all faulse information he is mad because of a demote i chose him after 5days on Constinly playing my server. He was moat active player[/quote]
Activity shouldn’t be correlated with ability to handle the tasks of being a staff member.

Read full topic
